item.title: Who has a Hackintosh?
item.dc:creator: @Mezzyscape562 Mezzyscape562
item.description:
@Mezzyscape562 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:9, topic:451679”][quote author=Mezzyscape562 link=topic=554566.msg4062917#msg4062917 date=1343591045]

Tried once, every distribution that I tried to install wasn’t compatible with my hardware in my laptop one way or another so I gave up. Would have liked to have had it tri-booted.

Well if you tell me your specs maybe I can help

CPU: Intel Core i5 430M @ 2.2Ghz
RAM: 8gb DDR3 @ 1333mhz
GPU: AMD Radeon HD 5650M

I don’t think it was so much the hardware, just that the wireless card was incompatible.

You need the 10.6.6i by Hazard but Problem is that you won’t have wireless… But if its a wired desktop ur lucky
[/quote]
I have numerous other wireless adapters so I’m certain I can get at least one to work, and I don’t remember trying that distribution, will give it a try when I get the time :)[/quote]
If you have any of those your lucky.
RTL8187
RTL8187B
RTL8187L
BroadCom
Or RTL

Read full topic

item.title: Who has a Hackintosh?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“Mezzyscape562, post:8, topic:451679”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=554566.msg4062802#msg4062802 date=1343582049]

Tried once, every distribution that I tried to install wasn’t compatible with my hardware in my laptop one way or another so I gave up. Would have liked to have had it tri-booted.

Well if you tell me your specs maybe I can help

CPU: Intel Core i5 430M @ 2.2Ghz
RAM: 8gb DDR3 @ 1333mhz
GPU: AMD Radeon HD 5650M

I don’t think it was so much the hardware, just that the wireless card was incompatible.
[/quote]
You need the 10.6.6i by Hazard but Problem is that you won’t have wireless… But if its a wired desktop ur lucky :/[/quote]
I have numerous other wireless adapters so I’m certain I can get at least one to work, and I don’t remember trying that distribution, will give it a try when I get the time

Read full topic

I don’t think it was so much the hardware, just that the wireless card was incompatible.[/quote]
